benchmark

Class Stats

  • java.lang.Object
    • benchmark.Stats

  • public class Stats
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents some stats about a compression algorithm; contains also static methods to compute such stats.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      long compressedFileSize 
      long compressionElapsedTime 
      long decompressionElapsedTime 
      long originalFileSize 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Stats() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double compressionRatio()
      Returns the data compression ratio, which is the ratio between uncompressed size and compressed size (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_compression_ratio).
      static Stats computeStats(CompressionAlgorithm algorithm, java.nio.file.Path originalFilePath, byte[] originalData, int reps, IO io)
      Computes stats about the given compression algorithm.
      static Stats[] sumStats(Stats[][] stats)
      Returns a Stats object in which each variable is equal to the sum of the values it gets in each of the Stats object in the given array.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Stats

        public Stats()

    • Method Detail

      • compressionRatio

        public double compressionRatio()
        Returns the data compression ratio, which is the ratio between uncompressed size and compressed size (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Data_compression_ratio).
        Returns:
        The data compression ratio.

      • computeStats

        public static Stats computeStats(CompressionAlgorithm algorithm,
                                 java.nio.file.Path originalFilePath,
                                 byte[] originalData,
                                 int reps,
                                 IO io)
        Computes stats about the given compression algorithm.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - Compression algorithm to be used.
        originalFilePath - Path of the file to be compressed.
        originalData - Content of the file to be compressed.
        reps - How many times the file will be compressed and decompressed.
        io - An IO used to print possible error messages.
        Returns:
        Stats about the given compression algorithm.

      • sumStats

        public static Stats[] sumStats(Stats[][] stats)
        Returns a Stats object in which each variable is equal to the sum of the values it gets in each of the Stats object in the given array.
        Parameters:
        stats - The Stats objects whose variables' values will be summed.
        Returns:
        A Stats object in which each variable is equal to the sum of the values it gets in each of the Stats object in the given array.
